meanings.sent1: The farmer used manure to help his crops grow.
meanings.sent2: The manure was spread across the field to nourish the soil.
meanings.sent3: The manure smelled bad but was great for the plants.
meanings.sent4: The manure acted like a natural fertilizer, enriching the earth.
meanings.sent5: The manure was a stinky but effective way to improve the soil quality.

meanings.definition: To spread manure on land for fertilization.
meanings.sent1: The farmer will manure the fields tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She manures the garden every spring to help the flowers bloom.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to manure the soil before planting the seeds!
meanings.sent4: He manured the land with care, ensuring each plant would thrive.
meanings.sent5: Manuring the fields is essential for a successful harvest.
